resources.string: Thank you for downloading Shark Tips new app.

After signing up, you will 
 • Get a notification for each signal. 
 • Then, simply contact your trader to place the trade. 
 • If you do not have a good trader yet, we will help

Thanks to thorough market analysis, predictive software, and trading algorithms our team is able to send signals with high probability of returns followed by tens of thousands of traders worldwide since 2014.

Note that you might have to wait a few hours after sign up to get your first signal. This is because we send only the signals with the highest probability of returns. So please be patient (which as you know is sometimes the best trading strategy).
We pride ourselves on both our signals and customer service, so please do contact us for any enquiry, questions or problems you might encounter.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
